test_cases.name: test_enter_source_destination
test_cases.description: Verify user can enter source and destination
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_enter_source_destination(self, app):
        """Verify user can enter source and destination"""
        app.enter_source('Mumbai')
        assert app.get_source_text() == 'Mumbai', 'Source should be Mumbai'
        app.enter_destination('Pune')
        assert app.get_destination_text() == 'Pune', 'Destination should be Pune'
    
    def test_enter_source_invalid(self, app):
        """Verify invalid source entry"""
        app.enter_source('')
        assert app.get_source_text() == '', 'Source should be empty'

    def test_enter_destination_invalid(self, app):
        """Verify invalid destination entry"""
        app.enter_destination('')
        assert app.get_destination_text() == '', 'Destination should be empty'
```

import pytest

class TestBusTickets:
    
    def test_select_journey_date(self, app):
        """Verify user can select the journey date"""
        app.select_journey_date('Sat, 7 Sep')
        assert app.get_selected_date() == 'Sat, 7 Sep', 'Selected date should be Sat, 7 Sep'

    def test_select_journey_date_invalid(self, app):
        """Verify invalid date selection"""
        app.select_journey_date('')
        assert app.get_selected_date() == '', 'Selected date should be empty'
